definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: They also can be able to re-edit the post even after posting it.
sentences.chinese: 他们还可以能够重新编辑，即使它张贴的职位。

sentences.english: Wat is de functie van deze man?
sentences.chinese: 这个男人从事是什么职位？

sentences.english: A lecturer in the English Department has recently been refused tenure .
sentences.chinese: 英语系一名讲师最近未能获得终身职位。

sentences.english: I: What experience have you had that qualifies you for this position?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么样的经验能使你胜任这个职位？

sentences.english: Internal appointments are advertised on the notice-board.
sentences.chinese: 内部职位在通告栏中公布。

sentences.english: And 73 percent of them are frontline jobs, in city-level units or below.
sentences.chinese: 其中73%是市级或以下机关的基层职位。

sentences.english: A vacancy has arisen which I intend to fill.
sentences.chinese: 有一个职位空了出来，我想要补上。

sentences.english: Their employees enjoy life tenure and cannot be terminated.
sentences.chinese: 其员工享有职位终身制，无法终止劳动关系。

sentences.english: He was holding one end of a ribbon of crepe paper tied to a post.
sentences.chinese: 他拿着一个完一个丝带的绉纸捆绑到一个职位。

sentences.english: Have you been interviewed for a post with Youchange Foundation?
sentences.chinese: 您以前是否面试过友成基金会的其他职位？

sentences.english: But a focus exclusively on majors and job openings misses two key points.
sentences.chinese: 专门着眼于专业和职位的空缺漏掉了两个关键点。

sentences.english: However, this position frequently requires three-month-long trips abroad. Is that acceptable?
sentences.chinese: 但是这职位，经常须要外派三个月左右，你能接受吗？

sentences.english: Should fit vary by pos ITion in the company?
sentences.chinese: 匹配方式是否应根据职位而有所不同？

sentences.english: He desired to obtain a position in the Civil Service.
sentences.chinese: 他想望在政府行政机关里谋到一个职位。

sentences.english: I'm calling about your job vacancy.
sentences.chinese: 我想咨询一下你们的职位空缺。

sentences.english: I am just calling to follow up on the status of the Sales Manager position.
sentences.chinese: 我打电话只是想问一下出卖经理这个职位的延聘状况。

definition: to hold an office or post
an official position/a job in the bureaucracy
main job/day job/steady full-time job (as opposed to temporary or casual)/chief or principal post (as opposed to deputy)
civilian post (as opposed to military)/civil service/administration
to promote to a higher position
